column2: Login with different case in username
column3:
Stable internet connection
Website is up and running
User account already registered and active
column4:

2-Enter valid username but in different case (Ereny_Andro).

4-Click on login button.
column5:
if system is case sensitive show error: "Invalid username or password"
if system is case insensitive: login successful and user is redirect to the home page.
